messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please assist installing package on thursday october re please update package apologizes re attached mentioned machine regards thursday october re please update package hello please advice actions installed since package installed machine attached regards wednesday october pm re please update package copying owning anymore wednesday october pm please update package hello received because owner part routine kindly invited update package installed mentioned please let help best regards ext hub registered under number whose registered old broad street kingdom provide clients each subsidiaries separate
